span.span:
Help us honor our
LHS Alumni on the frontlines

Leonia High School would like to honor our Alumni that are working on the frontlines to help America battle the CoronaVirus. If you or anyone you know that has graduated from LHS is a doctor, nurse, medical provider, hospital support staff, EMT, Police Officer, or Fire Fighter helping keep Americans safe, please send a picture of you/them (preferably in action or in uniform), name, graduation year, occupation, and location to

or Edward.bertolini@leoniaschools.org. We will honor these heroes in our daily updates, Twitter accounts, School Website, and Leonia Public Schools Facebook page. Please help us honor our Alumni as the bravely fight COVID-19.
